title: New Product Introduction (NPI) Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. We at Apple don’t just build products — we create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of our people and our ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it. Join our dynamic R&D team at YTC! In this role, as a NPI engineer you will be responsible for Project Management and technically lead new products and technology development.
description: Act as communication channel between internal stake holders and suppliers. Management of project timeline, engineering builds, resources and logistic needs. Lead project requirement and design reviews with multi-functional group. Lead multi-functional engineering group on problem analysis and resolution.
preferred_qualifications: 5+ years of experience in leading product development and qualification for optics and/or camera modules. Camera related knowledge/experience. Operations experience in a manufacturing environment.
education_experience: B.S./M.S. in Science, Technology, Engineering or equivalent field
